RECIVE_SECURITY_PERSON = #{reciveSecurityPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

dic_sfjljzxz_key = #{dicSfjljzxzKey,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
dic_memeber_key = #{dicMemeberKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_IS_INF_MANAGE_KEY = #{dicIsInfManageKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_HAVE_MOBILE_KEY = #{dicHaveMobileKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_IS_FINISH_KEY = #{dicIsFinishKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DIC_CRIME_TYPE_KEY = #{dicCrimeTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUDGE_ORG = #{adjudgeOrg ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUDGE_ID = #{adjudgeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUDGE_DATE = #{adjudgeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADJUDGE_REDRESS_ORG = #{adjudgeRedressOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUDGE_REDRESS_T = #{adjudgeRedressT,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REDRESS_PERIOD = #{redressPeriod ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REDRESS_START_DATE = #{redressStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REDRESS_END_DATE = #{redressEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CRIME_FACT = #{crimeFact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_HAVE_TOGETHER_KEY = #{dicHaveTogetherKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIN_PLACE= #{detainPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TURN_OVER= #{turnOver,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DIC_OLD_LAG_KEY= #{dicOldLagKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_BAN= #{startBan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_BAN= #{endBan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TIME_BAN= #{timeBan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT_BAN= #{contentBan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORFEIT= #{forfeit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISENTITLE=#{disentitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ADJUDGE_STARTTIME=#{adjudgeStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADJUDGE_ENDTIME=#{adjudgeEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DIC_PENAL_TYPE_KEY=#{dicPenalTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
